body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Harris Auto Group. My name is Dennis Harris. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Margaret. Can you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - two three four - one zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Margaret. And could you also tell me your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is m.brown@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Margaret. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Margaret. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
